amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the Department of Justice's exemption to the payment of overtime to its attorneys.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 111 of the bill which relates to salary rates for lawyers at the Department of Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (VA) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 103 - 288 (Roll no. 320).
